3: A goal oriented software developer who loves to learn and create
5: I have been a programming enthusiast since the age of 15 and started my journey with Java, driven by its usage in my favorite game at the time. Later, I became interested in web development and learned the basics of HTML and CSS. After a year-long hiatus from development to focus on university entrance exams, I pursued a two-year degree in Computer Science at the Pontifical Catholic University of Minas Gerais but did not complete the program. Currently, I am studying Software Engineering at FIAP. My passion for software development has led me to seek every opportunity to enhance my skills and knowledge, consistently striving to exceed expectations.
